name: webpal
description: This README would normally document whatever steps are necessary to get the application up and running.

scripts.watch: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && webpack --watch; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill
scripts.start: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && webpack-dev-server; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill
scripts.build: bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server && webpack; bundle exec opal-webpack-compile-server kill
